name: Another Regular Survival Game
description:
If you want to survive, kill everything that moves. Be pacient, you will die a lot of times.

Very early version, more like a mini game of the whole idea.

2d Platformer- Survival Pixelart game

Programmer and also Artist: Aldhair (https://goo.gl/xWycEr)

Musician: Alfredo (https://goo.gl/zzzmmw)

Artist: Nancy (https://goo.gl/TVn2Rw)
